section.name: Features List
section.p:
Implemented features can be splitted into two categories :
Eclipse project and Maven project synchronization
Maven Launcher

ul.li: Dependencies resolving - class folders are ignored since i dont know yet what to do with them
Dependencies mapping view and SourceDirectory mapping view
Project Properties and Jar overriding support
Pom synchronization - SourceModification and Filtering not managed for now
Support for Pom Inheritance when synchronizing POMs

p.i: For more information, please see Mevenide Wiki

ul.li: Maven Runner - goals should be entered manually.

p.i: For more information, please see Mevenide Wiki

section.p: Please note that a POM Editor is also in progress.
